rooms.description: A spacious lobby with built-in seating and decorative art deco motifs.
rooms.vastu_compatibility: East-facing entrance ensures positive energy entry.

rooms.description: Large open space with floor-to-ceiling windows offering a view of the garden. Art deco design elements like geometric patterns and bold colors.
rooms.vastu_compatibility: South or west-facing for optimal natural light.

rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a modern art deco dining table and seating area.
rooms.vastu_compatibility: East or north-facing for balanced energy.

rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances integrated into an art deco design scheme.
rooms.vastu_compatibility: South-west corner to maintain energy flow.

rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with ample storage and art deco detailing.
Dedicated living space for domestic help, ensuring privacy and convenience.
rooms.vastu_compatibility: North-east or west-facing to maintain a harmonious environment.

openings.description: A grand entry with art deco styling and large floor-to-ceiling glass doors leading into the entrance hall.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room facing the expansive garden. Provides natural light and scenic views.
A separate entrance ensuring privacy for servant quarters.
Balcony door leading from the living room to an outdoor seating area overlooking the garden.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with art deco furniture and a private balcony offering garden views.
Additional bedroom with art deco motifs and sufficient storage space.
rooms.vastu_compatibility: North-west facing for a peaceful atmosphere.

rooms.description: Modern bathroom integrated with the master bedroom with luxury fixtures and art deco detailing.
Dedicated workspace with a view of the garden and art deco decorative elements.

openings.description: A spacious staircase connecting the ground and first floors with art deco balustrades.
Balconies from both master bedroom and study area offering garden views.
Series of floor-to-ceiling windows throughout the first floor to enhance natural lighting.
